timeline.bodyText:
My naive reaction to this is "250% of what?" - I don't think most users will understand the exact effect here
It is perhaps a difficult idea to express but I'd like the warning to work for a user that has no idea what's going on.
Unrelated, I think the phrasing should begin something like "Rescheduling will also reset the ease ..." because it's a side effect that comes as a package deal, if I understand correctly, not as something separate from what the user is trying to do?
